item.title: I-10 East Approaching Exit 6
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 6 - TX-375 Loop/Talbot Ave/Transmountain Road. This is the the northwestern end of the TX-375 Loop, which crosses the Franklin Mountains, and loops around Fort Bliss, before turning into the Border Freeway.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 34 and 32
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 34 - Loop 375/Joe Battle Blvd./Americas Ave. Exit 34 is currently closed due to construction.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 34
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 34 - TX-375 Loop/Americas Ave./Joe Battle Blvd. This is the eastern edge of TX-375 Loop which encircles the city of El Paso.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 29
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 29 - TX-375 Loop North/Woodrow Bean Transmountain Drive. This is the northern end of the TX-375 Loop around El Paso. Approaching Sun Valley Drive, FM-3255/MLK Jr. Blvd./Kenworthy St./Sean Haggerty Drive interchanges.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 26
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 26 - Business US-54/Dyer St./Hercules Ave. Approaching Hondo Pass Road, Diana Drive, and TX-375 Loop/Trans Mountain Woodrow Bean Drive.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 9
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 9 - Redd Road. Approaching TX-178/Artcraft Road/Paseo del Norte and TX-375 Loop/Transmountain Road/Talbot Ave interchanges.

item.title: TX-375 Loop - Exit 48
item.description: TX-375 Loop southwest approaching Exit 48 - Juarez, Mexico/Zaragoza International Bridge/Zaragoza Road.

item.title: TX-375 Loop - Exits 47 and 48
item.description: TX-375 Loop southwest at Exit 47 - TX-20/FM-258/Alameda Ave./Socorro Road/Pan American Drive. Approaching Exit 48 - Juarez, Mexico/Zaragoza International Bridge/Zaragoza Road.

item.title: TX-375 Loop South - Exit 47
item.description: TX-375 Loop South approaching Exit 47 - TX-20/FM-258/Alameda Ave./Socorro Road/Pan American Drive.

item.title: TX-375 Loop South - Exit 45
item.description: TX-375 Loop South at Exit 45 - FM-76/North Loop Road. Approaching TX-20/Alameda Ave. and FM-258/Soccoro Road/Pan American Drive.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 34B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 34B - TX-375 Loop South/Americas Ave./Joe Battle Blvd.

item.title: I-10 East - Exits 34A and B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 34A - TX-375 Loop North. Approaching Exit 34B - TX-375 Loop South/Americas Ave./Joe Battle Blvd. I-10 continues east towards Van Horn and San Antonio. This is the eastern end of TX-375 Loop.
